EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to VinSolutions!
You will receive an email from Salesforce with your login credentials (check your junk mailbox).
Next Steps: Update your email settings in Salesforce and Outlook, click here for instructions.
Click here to access the Salesforce Learning Center. If you are unable to open this link, please contact me for assistance
Your license level does not allow you access to Leads, Opportunities, Solutions and Cases. To access our Support knowledgebase click on the "Click to Submit a Ticket" link in the sidebar of Salesforce.
If you have any further issues or requests regarding Salesforce, please email Salesforce at salesforce@vinsolutions.com
Thank you and Welcome to VinSolutions!
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Phone}, Ext.{!User.Extension}
